title: Add app logo to Global ZGEY application

requirements.text: Display the Global ZGEY app logo in the Layout header component, replacing or complementing the existing "Global Connect" text branding
acceptanceCriteria: The app logo image is visible in the Layout header
Logo maintains proper aspect ratio and sizing for header display
Logo is loaded from the generated assets directory as a static asset
Logo displays correctly on both light and dark themes

requirements.text: Add the Global ZGEY logo to the HTML document head as a favicon for browser tab display
acceptanceCriteria: Favicon appears in browser tabs when the application is open
Favicon uses appropriate size (16x16 or 32x32 pixels)
Favicon is linked correctly in frontend/index.html

constraints: Do not modify immutable frontend paths: useInternetIdentity, useActor, main.tsx, or components/ui directory
Logo image must be loaded from frontend/public/assets/generated directory as a static asset
Do not route generated logo through the backend
nonGoals: Multiple logo sizes for different breakpoints
Logo customization or theme-specific logo variants beyond basic display

required: Global ZGEY app logo with globe illustration, soundwave element, and connected user avatars on dark background matching the uploaded reference design (global-zgey-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Global ZGEY favicon with simplified icon version suitable for browser tab display (global-zgey-favicon.dim_32x32.png)
